titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Vouchers from the Virginia Land Office, 1875
titlestmt.author: Claire Radcliffe

publicationstmt.date: © 2015 By The Library of Virginia. All Rights Reserved.

titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Vouchers from the Virginia Land Office, 1875
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia LOI 132

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Vouchers from the Virginia Land Office, 1875
did.origination: Virginia. Superintendent of Weights and Measures.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia. Superintendent of Weights and Measures. Vouchers from the Virginia Land Office, 1875. Accession Land Office inventory entry no. 132, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Archives Branch, Richmond, VA 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession LOI 132 transferred by the Secretary of the Commonwealth, 1948.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The act which established the previous Land Office passed the General Assembly on 22 June 1779. The register was the head of the Office and was appointed by joint ballot of both houses of the legislature.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records contain vouchers submitted for repairs to cattle pens at the state scale yards in Richmond.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Virginia. Superintendent of Weights and Measures.
